en.title: FusonExcel Arrives in the City of Churches - Adelaide, South Australia.
en.content:
REPORT BY AUSTRALIAN COUNTRY LICENSEE VASU.

Adelaide, also known as the City of Churches in South Australia, recently became the 6th city for FusionExcel's continued Australian capital cities expansion plan into Australia. The occasion was the Psychic, Mind & Soul Expo at the Jubilee Pavilion, Royal Adelaide Showgrounds on 30th and 31st May. 

The 2 days show drew some 10,000 visitors and FE booths attracted a steady number of people who experienced FE's scalar energy products for the first time and were amazed. Amongst those who came to the booth were other exhibitors at the show when word got around quickly about the amazing demos. "Incredible, weird, freaky, too good to be through" were some of the expressions heard throughout the show with the participants showing keen interest in FE's product range. The crowd along the aisle came to a standstill when 2 girls and 2 guys were able to lift a visitor weighing 80kg from the chair a meter high by wearing the Quantum Pendant. Some visitors even experienced immediate improvements to their migraines, stiff shoulders and joint pains. Stall holders who started wearing the Quantum Pendant in the morning felt more energized by the evening and reported as not being tired at all! 

Sales were steady with many expressing interests to acquire the product at some stage. A few others even discarded pendants that they were using and opted for the FE Quantum Pendant straightaway after being shown the demonstrable superiority of FE's products. A few distributors and a stockiest is expected to be appointed in Adelaide soon. 

Thanks to FE members Rubina, Roy, Matt, Che and Jodie for their participation and support at this South Australian inaugural event coordinated by Australian Country Licensee, Vasu.
